e: ￹`Pa~`tomecek~ `sa~`~ `cingra~ `a~ `somowal~ `takowanan~.￺He directed his words to me.￻他瞪眼看著我
￹`Icowa~ `ko~ `pa~`tomecek~`an~ `iso~?￺Where is your focus point? (in choosing a person)￻你的目標在那裡？
￹`Cima~ `ko~ `ka~`tomecek~`an~ `iso~?￺Whom are you considering?￻你在顧慮誰呀！你在關心什麼人？
d.f: ￹￺to focus on one thing only￻瞪眼，目不轉睛，凝視
